review_data.title: Very good food!
review_data.content: We had an early dinner here before flying out and the burger was delicious! A bit short on staff so it took some time to order and pay. Very friendly staff though. I’m coming back!

review_data.title: Buen restaurante de aeropuerto
review_data.content: Una excelente opción en el aeropuerto de Zurich. Local tranquilo y confortable, en el primer piso. Decoración muy agradable. Servicio...More

review_data.title: Good, fast meal
review_data.content: 3,5 TripAdvisor stars ⭐️ I had the chicken in a basket, and it was good. The others had a burger which was also good. It’s not haute cuisine, but it certainly works.

review_data.title: Feines Frühstück und gute Röstis

review_data.title: SPUNTINO IN COINCIDENZA
review_data.content: In attesa della mia coincidenza,ho preso uno spuntino ed un paio di birre. Il tutto,di elevate qualita'. Locale molto bello,pulitissimo...More

review_data.title: Sehr gut

review_data.title: Quiet and cosy place at Zurich Airport air side
review_data.content: I usually don't evaluate Airport restaurants. I'm making an exception here because this place was really nice. I had a 4 hours layover at Zurich Airport and I've spent 2 very nice hours here. I had lunch for a reasonable price, with table service and...More

review_data.title: Nice dinner
review_data.content: A good place for a final dinner in Zurich. Enjoyed the chicken with salad. Much nicer compared to other airports!
